snippet.title: Hoplite
snippet.description:
A turn-based strategy game focusing on tactical movement around small maps.

Avaliable for:
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magmafortress.hoplite
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/hoplite/id782438457?mt=8&ign-mpt=uo%3D4

Created by:
@MagmaFortress
www.magmafortress.com
